scripts.deploy:dev:infra: cdk deploy EcsJenkinsGithubDevInfrastructureStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/cdk-projects-new.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dev:app: cdk deploy EcsJenkinsGithubDevApplicationStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/cdk-projects-new.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod:infra: cdk deploy EcsJenkinsGithubProdInfrastructureStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/cdk-projects-new.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod:app: cdk deploy EcsJenkinsGithubProdApplicationStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/cdk-projects-new.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dr:infra: cdk deploy EcsJenkinsGithubDrInfrastructureStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/cdk-projects-new.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dr:app: cdk deploy EcsJenkinsGithubDrApplicationStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/cdk-projects-new.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:infra: cdk deploy --app 'npx ts-node bin/multi-stack-cdk.ts' --context deploy-target=infra --context env=$npm_config_env
scripts.deploy:cluster: cdk deploy --app 'npx ts-node bin/multi-stack-cdk.ts' --context deploy-target=cluster --context env=$npm_config_env --context cluster-version=$npm_config_cluster_version
scripts.deploy:app: cdk deploy --app 'npx ts-node bin/multi-stack-cdk.ts' --context deploy-target=app --context env=$npm_config_env --context version=$npm_config_version
scripts.deploy:all: cdk deploy --app 'npx ts-node bin/multi-stack-cdk.ts' --context deploy-target=all --context env=$npm_config_env
